description: A playful take on why stairs can't be trusted.
title: Staircase Shenanigans
n_1: Sam eyes the quirky spiral staircase with suspicion.
n_2: Riley tries to hide a grin as Sam points at the stairs.
c1_2: I'm not sure. It looks like it's up to something.
c2_2: Don't be silly, it's just a staircase!
n_3: Cautiously, Sam begins to climb, while Riley watches.
n_4: At the top, they discover the humorous sign.
c1_4: I knew it! Can't trust stairs!
c2_4: Told you it was just being stair-y!
